# StataSTPM2utils

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of StataSTPM2utils is to  obtain CIF, difference in CIF, and Restricted Mean Time Lost (RMTL) from a stpm2 Stata model with the possibility to run non-parametric bootstrap.

## Installation

You can install the development version of StataSTPM2utils from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("caterinagregorio/StataSTPM2utils")
```

## Load package

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(StataSTPM2utils)
## basic example code
```
